com.aventstack.extentreports.reporter

Class ExtentXReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aventstack.extentreports.reporter.AbstractReporter
      • com.aventstack.extentreports.reporter.ExtentXReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtentReporter, ReportAggregatesListener, TestListener

    public class ExtentXReporter
extends AbstractReporter
    ExtentXReporter is a NoSQL database reporter (MongoDB by default), which updates information in the database which is then used by the ExtentX server to display in-depth analysis.
